Source: Update settings related to current game
en-us: Update settings related to current game
zh-cn: 更新当前游戏的相关设置

Source: Enable Studio Access to API Services
en-us: Enable Studio Access to API Services
zh-cn: 允许 Studio 访问 API 服务
仅开放给此游戏的开发人员
可接受的文件: {fileTypes}{newline}建议的分辨率: 512 x 512

Source: Image will be reviewed by moderators before being made visible to other users
en-us: Image will be reviewed by moderators before being made visible to other users
ko: 이미지는 검열팀의 검토가 끝난 후에 다른 사용자들에게 공개됩니다
zh-cn: 图片将由协调员审查，然后再对其他用户开放显示

Source: New to making icons? Check out the Icon Tutorial.
en-us: New to making icons? Check out the Icon Tutorial.
ko: 아이콘을 처음 만드시나요? 아이콘 튜토리얼을 확인하세요.
zh-cn: 不熟悉制作图标吗? 来看看图标教程吧。

Source: You can set up to {maxThumbnails:int} screenshots and YouTube videos for a game.
en-us: You can set up to {maxThumbnails:int} screenshots and YouTube videos for a game.
ko: 게임에 대한 스크린숏과 YouTube 비디오 섬네일은 최대 {maxThumbnails:int}장까지 설정할 수 있습니다.
zh-cn: 一个游戏最多可设置 {maxThumbnails:int} 组屏幕截图和 YouTube 视频。

Source: Acceptable image files: {fileTypes} | Recommended resolution: 1920 x 1080
en-us: Acceptable image files: {fileTypes} | Recommended resolution: 1920 x 1080
ko: 허용 가능한 이미지 파일: {fileTypes} | 권장 해상도: 1920 x 1080
zh-cn: 可接受的图片文件: {fileTypes} | 建议的分辨率: 1920 x 1080

Source: Items will be reviewed by moderators before being made visible to other users.
en-us: Items will be reviewed by moderators before being made visible to other users.
ko: 아이템은 검열팀의 검토가 끝난 후에 다른 사용자들에게 공개됩니다.
zh-cn: 项目会在协调员审查后，再对其他用户开放。

Source: Allow game server to issue requests to remote servers.
en-us: Allow game server to issue requests to remote servers.
ko: 게임 서버가 원격 서버로 요청을 발행할 수 있도록 허용합니다.
zh-cn: 允许游戏服务器对远程服务器发出请求。

Source: Enables Studio access to game services such as Data Stores
en-us: Enables Studio access to game services such as Data Stores
ko: Studio에서 Data Stores와 같은 게임 서비스로 접근할 수 있습니다
zh-cn: 允许 Studio 访问数据存储等游戏服务

Source: Do you agree that your game is controller compatible and contains NONE of the following?
en-us: Do you agree that your game is controller compatible and contains NONE of the following?
ko: 이 게임은 컨트롤러가 호환되며 다음과 같은 콘텐츠가 없음에 동의하십니까?
zh-cn: 你同意让游戏兼容控制器，并确认游戏不包含以下内容吗?

Source: Studio doesn't currently support video playing
en-us: Studio doesn't currently support video playing
ko: Studio는 현재 비디오 재생을 지원하지 않습니다
zh-cn: Studio 当前不支持视频播放

Source: Go to YouTube and play the video
en-us: Go to YouTube and play the video
zh-cn: 前往 YouTube 并播放视频

Source: Would you like to discard all changes?
en-us: Would you like to discard all changes?

Source: Are you sure you want to make this game private?
en-us: Are you sure you want to make this game private?
zh-cn: 确定要将此游戏设为私人吗?

Source: Making this game private will shut down any running games.
en-us: Making this game private will shut down any running games.
ko: 이 게임을 비공개로 설정하면 실행 중인 게임이 종료됩니다.
zh-cn: 将此游戏设为私人将会关闭所有进行中的游戏。

Source: Changing the game's Avatar Type to this setting will shut down any running games.
en-us: Changing the game's Avatar Type to this setting will shut down any running games.
ko: 게임의 아바타 유형을 이 설정으로 변경하면 실행 중인 게임이 종료됩니다.
zh-cn: 将游戏的虚拟形象类型更改为此设定将会关闭所有运行中的游戏。

Source: Would you like to delete this thumbnail?
en-us: Would you like to delete this thumbnail?

Source: The name didn't go through our moderation. Please revise it and try again.
en-us: The name didn't go through our moderation. Please revise it and try again.
ko: 이름이 검열을 통과하지 못했어요. 수정한 후 다시 시도하세요.
zh-cn: 此名称没有通过审核。请修改后再试一次。

Source: The description didn't go through our moderation. Please revise it and try again.
en-us: The description didn't go through our moderation. Please revise it and try again.
ko: 설명이 검열을 통과하지 못했어요. 수정한 후 다시 시도하세요.
zh-cn: 此描述没有通过审核。请修改后再试一次。

Source: You're uploading too much, please wait and try again later.
en-us: You're uploading too much, please wait and try again later.
ko: 업로드가 너무 많습니다. 나중에 다시 시도하세요.
zh-cn: 你已上传过多文件。请稍候重试。

Source: File uploaded does not match known image format. Try converting to png.
en-us: File uploaded does not match known image format. Try converting to png.
ko: 업로드된 파일이 알려진 이미지 형식과 일치하지 않습니다. PNG로 변환하세요.
zh-cn: 上传的文件与已知图片格式不匹配。请将其转换为 png 格式。

Source: You must select at least one playable device.
en-us: You must select at least one playable device.
ko: 플레이 가능한 기기를 최소 1개 선택해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 你必须选择至少一种可玩设备。

Source: Change Avatar Type will shut down the running game when save settings
en-us: Change Avatar Type will shut down the running game when save settings
ko: 아바타 유형을 변경하면 설정 저장 시 실행 중인 게임이 종료됩니다
zh-cn: 更改虚拟形象类型会在保存设置时关闭进行中的游戏

Source: Would you like to discontinue this subscription?
en-us: Would you like to discontinue this subscription?

Source: This will cancel all renewing payments. You must maintain benefits until no subscribers remain.
en-us: This will cancel all renewing payments. You must maintain benefits until no subscribers remain.
ko: 정기 결제가 모두 해지됩니다. 가입자가 없을 때까지 혜택을 유지해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 所有例行付款将会取消，你必须维持福利，直到没有订阅者为止。

Source: Cannot play or edit this game
en-us: Cannot play or edit this game
ko: 이 게임을 플레이하거나 편집할 수 없음
zh-cn: 无法玩此游戏，或对其进行编辑

Source: Can play and edit this game
en-us: Can play and edit this game
ko: 이 게임을 플레이하거나 편집할 수 있음
zh-cn: 可以玩此游戏，或对其进行编辑

Source: Can play, edit, and manage this game
en-us: Can play, edit, and manage this game
ko: 이 게임을 플레이, 편집, 관리할 수 있음
zh-cn: 可以玩此游戏，或对其进行编辑与管理

Source: An error has occurred with moderating the name and description. Please try again later!
en-us: An error has occurred with moderating the name and description. Please try again later!
ko: 이름과 설명을 검열하는 데 오류가 발생했어요. 잠시 후 다시 시도하세요!
zh-cn: 过滤名称与描述时发生错误。请稍候重试!

Source: Must be a valid positive integer
en-us: Must be a valid positive integer

zh-cn: 正在将游戏发布到 Roblox

Source: is required for changing Avatar game settings
en-us: is required for changing Avatar game settings
ko: 은(는) 아바타 게임 설정을 변경하는 데 필요합니다
zh-cn: 是更改虚拟形象游戏设置所必需的
正在将游戏发布到 Roblox

Source: Classic Roblox, heavier gravity, higher jump
en-us: Classic Roblox, heavier gravity, higher jump
ko: 클래식 Roblox, 무거운 중력, 높은 점프
zh-cn: 经典 Roblox，重力加倍，跳得更高
真实世界重力，运动员级别体能

Source: Slightly heavier gravity, jump higher, walk faster
en-us: Slightly heavier gravity, jump higher, walk faster
ko: 다소 무거운 중력, 높은 점프, 빠른 걸음걸이
zh-cn: 重力稍大，跳得更高，走得更快

Source: You cannot add more than {maxNumCollaborators:int} collaborators
en-us: You cannot add more than {maxNumCollaborators:int} collaborators
ko: 공동 작업자는 최대 {maxNumCollaborators:int}명까지만 추가할 수 있습니다.
zh-cn: 无法添加 {maxNumCollaborators:int} 位以上的协作者

Source: To add collaborators, turn on Team Create
en-us: To add collaborators, turn on Team Create
ko: 공동 작업자를 추가하려면 팀 만들기를 활성화하세요
zh-cn: 要添加协作者，请打开“组队创作”

Source: Search by user or group name
en-us: Search by user or group name
zh-cn: 按用户或群组名称搜索
我们对许可系统进行了更新！

Source: The source language represents the language that the game has been written in.
en-us: The source language represents the language that the game has been written in.
ko: 소스 언어란 게임 제작 시 사용된 언어를 뜻합니다.
zh-cn: 源语言代表制作游戏时使用的开发语言。

Source: Automatically capture text from game UI while players play.
en-us: Automatically capture text from game UI while players play.
ko: 플레이어가 플레이하는 동안 게임 UI에서 텍스트를 자동으로 캡처합니다.
zh-cn: 当玩家进行游戏时自动从游戏界面抓取文本。
在游戏中启用已翻译的内容。

Source: Automatic translation is unavailable for current source language.
en-us: Automatic translation is unavailable for current source language.
ko: 해당 소스 언어에는 자동 번역이 제공되지 않습니다.
zh-cn: 当前源语言无法使用自动翻译。

Source: to further manage the cloud localization table for this game.
en-us: to further manage the cloud localization table for this game.
ko: 이 게임의 클라우드 로컬리제이션 테이블을 추가로 관리할 수 있습니다.
zh-cn: 进一步管理此游戏的云本地化表格。

ko: 그러면 로컬리제이션 옵션을 활성화할 수 있습니다.

Source: Maximum number of players allowed in a single instance of the game.
en-us: Maximum number of players allowed in a single instance of the game.
ko: 단일 게임 인스턴스에 허용되는 최대 플레이어 수.
zh-cn: 游戏的每个实例中所允许的玩家数量上限。

Source: Fills your server to optimize for the best social gameplay experience.
en-us: Fills your server to optimize for the best social gameplay experience.
ko: 최고의 소셜 게임 플레이 경험을 위해 서버를 채웁니다.
zh-cn: Roblox 将自动优化服务器的填充方式以获得最佳社交游戏体验。

Source: Choosing this option could cause you to lose out on gameplay time and Robux earned.
en-us: Choosing this option could cause you to lose out on gameplay time and Robux earned.
ko: 이 옵션을 선택하면 게임 플레이 시간 및 Robux 수익이 감소할 수 있습니다.
zh-cn: 选择该选项后可能会导致产品的游戏时间与 Robux 收入下降。
自定义服务器留位数量

Source: Friends are more likely to join players in your game if you reserve slots.
en-us: Friends are more likely to join players in your game if you reserve slots.
ko: 슬롯을 예약하면 플레이어가 내 게임에서 친구와 합류할 수 있는 가능성이 높아집니다.
zh-cn: 如果在服务器上预留位置，玩家更有可能在游戏中加入其好友。

Source: Private Servers must not be enabled, and the game must be public to enable Paid Access.
en-us: Private Servers must not be enabled, and the game must be public to enable Paid Access.
ko: 유료 액세스를 활성화하려면 비공개 서버를 비활성화하고 게임을 공개해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 启用付费访问前，需要禁用私人服务器并将游戏设为公开。

Source: Paid Access must not be enabled and the game must be public to enable VIP Servers.
en-us: Paid Access must not be enabled and the game must be public to enable VIP Servers.
ko: VIP 서버를 활성화하려면 유료 액세스를 비활성화하고 게임을 공개해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 启用 VIP 服务器前，需要禁用付费访问并将游戏设为公开。

ko: 게시 후 게임 설정 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.
zh-cn: 发布后即可使用游戏设置功能。

Source: Please enter a number betwen {minRange:int} and {maxRange:int}.
en-us: Please enter a number betwen {minRange:int} and {maxRange:int}.
zh-cn: 请输入 {minRange:int} 和 {maxRange:int} 之间的一个数字。

Source: By enabling, players can purchase items provided by third parties.
en-us: By enabling, players can purchase items provided by third parties.

Source: By enabling, players can be teleported to other games. However, teleports between places in this game and between games owned by the same creator will be permitted.
en-us: By enabling, players can be teleported to other games. However, teleports between places in this game and between games owned by the same creator will be permitted.

Source: This button will shutdown all currently running instances of your game
en-us: This button will shutdown all currently running instances of your game
ko: 이 버튼은 현재 실행 중인 모든 게임 인스턴스를 종료합니다
zh-cn: 按下此按钮将会关闭当前游戏所有正在运行的实例

Source: This option grants every user of Roblox the right to use (in various ways) the content you are not sharing. For more information about sharing content please review the Terms of Use.
en-us: This option grants every user of Roblox the right to use (in various ways) the content you are not sharing. For more information about sharing content please review the Terms of Use.
ko: 이 옵션은 회원님이 공유하지 않은 콘텐츠를 다양한 방식으로 사용할 수 있는 권한을 Roblox의 모든 사용자에게 부여합니다. 콘텐츠 공유에 대한 자세한 내용이 궁금하다면 이용 약관을 확인하세요.
zh-cn: 开启此选项即表示 Roblox 的所有用户将会对你未进行分享的内容拥有（多种方式的）使用权限。如果想要获取关于分享内容的更多信息，请详见我们的使用条款。

Source: Are you sure you want to shutdown all servers for this game?
en-us: Are you sure you want to shutdown all servers for this game?
zh-cn: 确定要关闭当前游戏的所有服务器吗？

Source: Failed to load settings for page
en-us: Failed to load settings for page

Source: Only the game owner can edit these settings
en-us: Only the game owner can edit these settings
ko: 게임 소유자만 이 설정을 편집할 수 있습니다
zh-cn: 只有游戏所有者才能对这些设置进行编辑

Source: VIP Servers must not be enabled and the game must be public to enable Paid Access.
en-us: VIP Servers must not be enabled and the game must be public to enable Paid Access.
ko: 유료 액세스를 활성화하려면 VIP 서버를 비활성화하고 게임을 공개해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 启用付费访问前，需要禁用 VIP 服务器并将游戏设为公开。

Source: Paid Access must not be enabled and the game must be public to enable VIP Servers.
en-us: Paid Access must not be enabled and the game must be public to enable VIP Servers.
ko: VIP 서버를 활성화하려면 유료 액세스를 비활성화하고 게임을 공개해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 启用 VIP 服务器前，需要禁用付费访问并将游戏设为公开。

Source: Warning: Changing the price of VIP Servers will cancel all existing subscriptions.
en-us: Warning: Changing the price of VIP Servers will cancel all existing subscriptions.
ko: 주의: VIP 서버 가격을 변경하면 기존 가입 사항이 모두 취소됩니다.
zh-cn: 警告：更改 VIP 服务器价格后将会取消所有当前订阅。

Source: Warning: Changing the price of Private Servers will cancel all existing subscriptions.
en-us: Warning: Changing the price of Private Servers will cancel all existing subscriptions.
ko: 주의: 비공개 서버 가격을 변경하면 기존 가입 사항이 모두 취소됩니다.
zh-cn: 警告：更改私人服务器价格后将会取消所有当前订阅。

Source: Paid Access must not be enabled, and the game must be public to enable Private Servers.
en-us: Paid Access must not be enabled, and the game must be public to enable Private Servers.
ko: 비공개 서버를 활성화하려면 유료 액세스를 비활성화하고 게임을 공개해야 합니다.
zh-cn: 启用私人服务器前，需要禁用付费访问并将游戏设为公开。
